reference.title: cxxTypedefNameLookup
reference.shortdesc: Provides a unique identifier for the typedef.

section.title: Description
section.p: This element provides a way of uniquely identifying a typedef in a body of DITA XML that describes a body of C++ source code.

The PCDATA contained within the <cxxTypedefNameLookup> element is free format. The PCDATA text should:
be unique within a set of DITA XML files.
be human readable.
follow the lookup techniques use in the C++ standard (ISO/IEC 14882:2003(E)).
use a reversible encoding.
